title: Friday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
HYPERGAMOUSE Episode 37: Temptation

SAVAGE MEMES Episode 66: Vegan Dog

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 38: Propagandalf

ADOBE KROGER Episode 4

RIGHT HO, JEEVES Episode 31: Don’t Talk Rot

FATHER GABRIEL’S JOURNEY Episode 10: Sara at the Monastery

We also have a call for Japanese translation help from the Arktoons Production Editor.

Can you help Arktoons?

Arktoons offers a wide selection of stories and artistic styles, and our range is constantly growing.

We are about to adapt an original Japanese manga series, but we need people who can read Japanese fluently (ideally they would be native Japanese speakers) to translate the text into English.

If you’re fluent in Japanese then please email: arkhavencomics@outlook.com

Can you help Arktoons?
Arktoons offers a wide selection of stories and artistic styles, and our range is constantly growing.
We are about to adapt an original Japanese manga series, but we need people who can read Japanese fluently (ideally they would be native Japanese speakers) to translate the text into English.
